vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προκαταρτ-ίζω,
complete beforehand, [NT+2nd c.BC+]:—passive, προκατηρτισμένος got ready, prepared beforehand, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to arrange for in advance, get ready beforehand prepare
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to arrange for in advance, get ready beforehand prepare
to make ready, prepare, or complete beforehand, in advance 2Cor. 9:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: preparer de antemano o con anticipación
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 準備, 預先安排 (林後 9:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 准备, 预先安排 (林后 9:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chuẩn bị sẵn sàng trước. πρό (G4253) + καταρτίζω (G2675)
